definition: to use/to put to use
to move/to transport/to use/to apply/fortune/luck/fate
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
to have a fluent command of (idiom)

sentences.english: Use the concept map to promote dialogue and cooperation.
sentences.chinese: 運用概念圖，促進對話與合作。

sentences.english: Arced lines are frequently used in Chinese-style design.
sentences.chinese: 弧形的線條在中國風的設計中運用頗多。

sentences.english: Will you please use your influence with him not to do it?
sentences.chinese: 請你運用你的影響力叫他不要做那事好嗎？

sentences.english: Applying the market rule to electronic unfair competition disputes is not always easy.
sentences.chinese: 運用該市場規律來消除電子不正當競爭並不容易。

sentences.english: The article conducts the research using method of the quota statistics and qualitative analysis.
sentences.chinese: 文章運用定量統計和定性分析的方法進行研究。

sentences.english: Boccaccino recommends that you use professional nursing combed wool.
sentences.chinese: 卡奇諾引薦您運用專業的羊毛護理梳。

sentences.english: But they use game theory to reward good translations with badges, yes?
sentences.chinese: 不過譯言有運用博弈論，好的翻譯會得證章，對吧？

sentences.english: Experiments show the proper application of this method can improve the effects of shot-put teaching.
sentences.chinese: 經過實驗研究，合理運用可以優化教學效果。

sentences.english: Stylist was not immersed in general understanding to apply this to behave gimmick. However painterly combination effect.
sentences.chinese: 設計師沒有陷入一般理解去運用這一表現手法。

sentences.english: You use all of your senses in guided imagery.
sentences.chinese: 在進行引導式景象刻畫時，你要運用到一切感官。

sentences.english: Widdowson ever criticized, "Structuralism focuses on language analysis and only reflects one aspect of communicative competence."
sentences.chinese: 而交際法有，過於恰恰相反注重語言在語境中的運用。

sentences.english: This will improve your phrase-slinging ability.
sentences.chinese: 這可以幫助你提高靈活運用詞彙的能力。

sentences.english: Its bifurcation characteristics are studied using the numerical integral method.
sentences.chinese: 運用數值積分法研究了系統的分岔特性。

sentences.english: His narrative is a super rendering of dialect speech and idiom.
sentences.chinese: 他的敘述是方言和土語最成功的運用。

sentences.english: Still, there's reason to be cautious aboutthe findings.
sentences.chinese: 然而，運用這個發現的成果仍需要謹慎。

sentences.english: He has no co ectio or acce to useful information.
sentences.chinese: 他從來不運用或接觸有用的資訊。

definition: to combine/to link/to integrate/binding/CL:次[ci4]
to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
structure/composition/makeup/architecture/CL:座[zuo4],個|个[ge4]
to embody/to reflect/to incarnate
to pass through/to penetrate/by means of/via
to come out/to emerge/to reveal/to display
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
to manifest
to present clearly/to give prominence to/to magnify/clear and obvious
to advance/to conduct/underway/in progress/to do/to carry out/to carry on/to execute
base/foundation/basis/underlying/CL:個|个[ge4]
to change/to transform/isomerization (chemistry)
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
many kinds of/multiple/diverse/multi-
to guide/to lead (around)/to conduct/to boot/introduction/primer
